name: Cyclamen the Rikka Fairy
effectText: You can Tribute this card from your hand or face-up field, then target up to 2 Plant monsters you control; reduce their Level(s) by 2 until the end of this turn. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was Tributed and sent there this turn: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Cyclamen the Rikka Fairy" once per turn.
